head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE ¶ . ¶ To the Honorable ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir ¶ , ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the ¶ four months ¶ ending ¶ 30...

div.p: D85/2897, unit 93, VPRS 3992/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p:
MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.
QUARTERLY ESTIMATE.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the four months ending 30th June 1885.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: none; border-right: none; border-top: 1.5pt solid #000000; border-bottom: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

cell.p: Estimate* of Expenditure for four months.

note.p: The numbers in this column have been inserted in a different hand, presumably at the Chief Secretary's Office.
